code: import{createStore,applyMiddleware}from'redux';import{composeWithDevTools}from'redux-devtools-extension';import thunk from'redux-thunk';import rootReducer from'./reducers';/*Redux thunk allows us to disptach actions like GET,POST api requests asynchronously and resolve each promise that gets returned*/var initialState={};var middleWare=[thunk];var store=createStore(rootReducer,initialState,composeWithDevTools(applyMiddleware.apply(void 0,middleWare)));export default store;
